ai-ja434:1.1_0: “I say it’s the domain of the Sakyans,
ai-ja434:1.2_0: Two people wander in the sky.
ai-ja434:1.3_0: Phoenixes are born from an egg.
ai-ja434:1.4_0: Rebirth is born in them, that is a brāhmaṇa.”
